room_title: Escape room "Civil War Conspiracy" by Port City Escape in Wilmington
room_description: Get transported back to 1861 just prior to the First Battle of Fort Fisher. Your team has been commissioned as spies for the Union. The hidden cabin of Confederate General Whiting holds crucial military secrets. Infiltrate the cabin and secure classified information pertaining to the Battle of Fort Fisher. Itâ€™s up to you and your team to sneak in and find the information before anyone finds you. The fate of the battle rests in your hands!
